channel.title: Able to use windows clipboard?
channel.description:
Any way to copy/paste to/from windows clipboard using scar?
Was going to try to clarify in the thread below (SendKeys dont work, or rather I guess it dont unless you grab windows itself but ummmm. :) ) someone else I *think* was tying to ask the same thing, but it was saying something about old thread yada yada.
Thanks.

item.title: Able to use windows clipboard?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Sure, you can use the Win32 API, so you can use Set/GetClipboardData etc. Search on MSDN.

Read full topic
